name: SmartBed
0:
”Alexa, launch smart bed”
”Alexa, ask smart bed to raise legs 5”
”Alexa, ask smart bed to lower head”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart bed
des: This custom skill was developed to send commands to an ESP32 Dev Module to control a Drive Medical Semi-Electric Bed with verbal commands through Alexa and Amazon IoT over WiFi. This skill allows users to raise and lower leg and head sections of bed by publishing commands to a topic on the ESP32 processor. If you are interested in adapting this code for your own use, please contact elise.carter@cuanschutz.edu.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
